title: Copious Oz Cooper revivals
content:
Sorry for the gratuitous self-promo, but they're new. Or old, as it were... just dusted off, redrawn according to Oswald Bruce Cooper's original sketches and proofs, properly spaced, and hung out to dry for the public below:

[Cooper Italic Complete](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013115446/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/wordshape/cooper-italic-complete/)

[Cooper Fullface Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013115446/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/wordshape/cooper-fullface/)

[Cooper Hilite Complete](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013115446/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/wordshape/cooper-highlight/)

Reviving and releasing true-to-form versions galore of Oz Cooper's classic fonts all year.
author: ilynam
